subtitle.subtitle: ♪ He's here to help you and me ♪
♪ They're all as brave as can be ♪
♪ He's a hero through and through ♪
♪ He is brave and strong and true ♪
♪ She is smart and friendly too ♪
♪ He's your buddy way up high in the sky ♪
♪ When you're in need, it's guaranteed ♪
♪ Is on the way to save the day ♪
♪ He's your friend until the end ♪
♪ Without a doubt shout it out ♪
[Cleany] What? There's a monster living near the reservoir?
Wearing a terrifying cloak over its head.
[Cab] It had scraps stuck all over it. [whimpers]
I can't tell you how weird it looked.
You think, that you saw the unlucky wanderer?
Hm. There's a story that there used to be a figure like that in Toto Village.
The reason that he got that name,
was anyone who met him would have lots of bad luck.
Like they've been cursed by a magician or something.
Then, did the unlucky wanderer put some sort of evil curse on me?
First time I've heard of him.
Anyway, do you really think that something is wrong?
He told us that the wanderer gives off a curse of terrible luck.
But it could just be some kind of rumor.
Nothing bad has actually happened to Cap yet, has it?
No, but, what if bad things do start happening to Cap?
It could be dangerous if it turns out that it's true.
Helly, you can't just say anything you want about someone you don't know.
Yeah, you're right about that. We should first meet this unknown friend
and then find out what kind of person he is.
According to Helly, he should be near here.
Huh? Poli that tent hasn't been there before.
Who are you? I said, who are you? [both gasp]
The Rescue Team of Brooms Town.
I'm Poli and this is Roy.
So, we came to say welcome.
Lies! You came to kick me out!
What on earth do you mean?
We were curious about you is all.
[thumps] I don't believe you! Go away!
Wait a minute, don't be like that.
Didn't I tell you that he was dangerous?
I don't think that he meant to hurt Poli at all.
Right. And I wasn't really hurt that much.
Well, I'm just glad it's all done.
I'll be sure to fix the damage in the morning, all right?
should we just leave him out there like that?
He didn't actually seem like a bad person.
In fact, it seemed like he was pretty scared.
If he wasn't a bad guy,
then he wouldn't have acted like that with you.
What if he has a problem he can't tell anyone about?
The fact is, we might very well need to take a closer look at him.
We should ask our friends who used to live in Toto Village.
They might know something about this unlucky wanderer.
Amber and I will head out in the morning.
[Posty] Cap, no matter how scared of the wanderer you are,
you can't expect us to come with you every time you have to come this way.
Oh, what choice do I have?
I'm too scared to come here all by myself.
It must be hard for Cap to feel this scared.
I even feel a little bit scared.
Something might jump out at us.
Even if something does, it'll be up against four of us.
Well, anyway, I wonder what the Rescue Team is going to do.
-Do you think it's the curse? -[all] What?
[rattling] Uh, what's that sound I hear?
Don't put a curse on us!
-Get out of our town. -[all] Get out!
[gasps] I need to get by, so get out of my way.
[Jin] What? He got bullied by his friends because of his looks?
Mm-hm. Tracky is his name. But because he has such big hands,
they made fun of him by calling him Monster Tracky.
Then, I guess he started wearing the cloth to cover himself
and he began to avoid his friends.
And he probably lived like a loner until he ended up in our town.
But, what about all these rumors that he causes bad luck.
His friends said they never actually saw anything bad happen around them.
I was judging him as a bad guy, too,
when I didn't know anything about him.
That's why you can't judge anybody
because of rumors, or because of the way they look.
Jin, you have to make the unlucky wanderer get out of town.
What are you talking about, Posty?
Cap's front bumper just suddenly fell off.
The curse of the unlucky wanderer has started to work!
And we have just seen the unlucky wanderer, too.
Tracky isn't going to hurt anyone.
We'll find a way to settle this in a friendly way, so just hold on.
All right, then. We'll trust you guys.
We really need to hurry and get this all cleared up.
Well, first, we'll have to get him to open up, which will be difficult
because his heart is frozen solid like a block of ice.
Then, how about this time we all go together to welcome him.
Great. If the whole team goes there, we can succeed in melting his heart.
Why do I have to walk this way?
If the wall breaks, the town will flood.
What if he doesn't wanna talk to us, after we've come all this way.
He might be trying to avoid us.
-[all] Huh? -[Helly] Where is that coming from?
Hm. Tracky is over there by the reservoir.
[Helly] Oh, my! Tracky is holding up the breaking floodgate with his body.
Helly, fly ahead and help Tracky.
I'm with the Rescue Team. Help is coming, just hold on.
Amber, when we get there you need to stabilize the wall.
[Poli] Roy, when Tracky moves, lock the hole with a boulder.
Tracky, now just carefully come out.
Tracky, you saved our whole town.
I... I did it to save my fields.
We came out here looking for you because we want to become your friends.
Yes. If you could just find a way to open your heart to us,
then we could all become your friends.
I'm sure everyone wouldn't like me anyway.
Not if they got the chance to actually get to know you.
I already think of you as a friend.
You just need to let everybody see the person that you really are.
Yeah, Tracky. I know you could do this.
I was really hoping to meet him.
Tracky, if you aren't ready to come out, we can come back later.
[Tracky] W-Wait. I'll be out in a bit.
Well, hello. Tracky is my name.
Nice to meet all of you.
It's great to know you, Tracky.
[all] It's very nice to meet you, Tracky. [chuckles]
I thought you'd see my big hands and get all scared of me or something.
We see they're nothing like the rumor said.
Yes. We're sorry that we thought you are something that you're not.
It's just so nice that you guys all accept me now.
We're all really pleased that you opened up your heart to us.
Tracky, let me welcome you to our town, friend.
♪ He's here to help you and me ♪
♪ They're all as brave as can be ♪
♪ He's a hero through and through ♪
♪ He is brave and strong and true ♪
♪ She is smart and friendly too ♪
♪ He's your buddy way up high in the sky ♪
♪ When you're in need, it's guaranteed ♪
♪ Is on the way to save the day ♪
♪ He's your friend until the end ♪
♪ Without a doubt shout it out ♪
